#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod=1e9+7;

#define fileinput freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fileoutput freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define T ll t ; cin>>t ; while(t--)

ll a[100005],b[100005];

int main()
{
    //fileinput;
    T{
        ll n,i,j;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%lld",&b[i]);

        ll ans=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
            for(j=0;j<n;j++) {
                if(a[j]==b[i]) {
                    for(ll k=j;k>i;k--){
                        ll temp;
                        temp=a[k];
                        a[k]=a[k-1];
                        a[k-1]=temp;
                        ans++;
                    }
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }

    return 0;
}
